works.description:
A part of the work and it's Authorized  
image by consent of Nathalia Suellen, www.ladysymphonia.com that was
stolen  
from me without consent is at this location on this girls blogspot  
-http://kinkincheezels.blogspot.com/2011/04/dream-of-darkness.html

It is a poem about vampires and has posted with it an image authorized for
 
display by Nathalia Suellen, Digital Dark Artist from Brazil, who is also 

one of your blogspot users.

The Poem is Titled, A Dream of Darkness and it's FULL rendition appears  
like this-

A Dream of Darkness

Entering the mist of night,
dark woven shadows...
a panoply
of unseen shrouds
like curtains of unlight,
which trap the thoughts
enrapturing the mind
within a veil of hidden sights,
exposing every sense
to dark unknowns,
brushing on the soulish realm,
begetting only terror
and paralyzing fright.
.
By touch alone
this iridescent light,
a promised thrill,
a wistful whim
is aptly known
evoking every flavor
of tantalized delight.
.
With spirit sense perceive
a chill sensation,
dark sweet passion
winding tight
like silk from widow weaved.
.
Transformed by predilection
to an eerie selling
of the soul
for shaded promise
with temptations vague.
.
With pensive heart receive
the souls delight
a dream of shadows flickering,
a dream elusive
in it's mocking flight
a dream of darkness...


© ·´~`·­»Garapan«­·´~`· 2011

Accompanied by the Digital Art of
Nathalia Suellen- Dark Artist
